item.title: How to automate your Kubernetes Ingress monitoring with Prometheus
item.description: Recently, I had the challenge of setting up monitoring for all the Ingress hosts in our cluster - which are A LOT. Since new hosts are added or removed all the time, I tried to find a way to automate the whole thing so that I don’t have to worry about it too much once it is initially set up and I am reliably notified when a failure occurs.
